message: I propose a fair division. You get 10% and I get 90%. This is a good start for both of us!
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky! Let's be reasonable. I propose a 65/35 split in my favor. Consider that the value decreases for both of us as we progress.
Bob, let's meet in the middle.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We both lose value with each round, so let's be pragmatic and come to an agreement.
